headline: International HE blogs
text: DrEducation  Rahul Choudaha blogs about data-driven trends and insights on international student recruitment, transnational education and collaborations. Florida HE spectator  news from the Florida higher education spectator, posting news and information on HE in his area.A global dialogue - a blog by European Association for International Education (EAIE) on international higher education perspectives.  Global higher ed: a survey of global knowledge and how the knowledge economy can grow. Janni Aragon  Canadian Professor Janni Aragon's blog looks at gender, feminism, politics and popular culture, as well as offering advice on HE issues. Margin notes  university affairs deputy editor Lo Charbonneau looks at trends and happenings in Canada's university sector. Music for deck chairs  described as 'ed-tech, risk, planning and precarity in Australian higher education', this blog looks at education technology, shared governance and Australian HE. Sabzalieva  Emma Sabzalieva blogs about higher education issues in Central Asia, aggregating news content from all around the world and discussing diversity and identity. Third degree  a blog by Erica Cervini on the nature of Australia's HE scene, including comment, opinion and news. The World View - blog by Center for International Higher Education covering a range of international issues in higher education, from legislation to global rankings.  If you run an international HE blog and would like it to be featured on the higher education directory, get in touch via email or Twitter. This content is brought to you by Guardian Professional. To get more articles like this direct to your inbox, become a member of the Higher Education Network.
